articles.title: Colorblind deputy sees color for first time
articles.description: Colorblind his whole life, Jeff Dishmon saw color for the very first time yesterday after his colleagues at the Humboldt County Sheriff’s office pitched in and bought him Enchroma glasses.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Growing concern over salmonella in raw turkey across the U.S.
articles.description: Experts are warning consumers about a salmonella outbreak linked to raw turkey. The CDC reports 164 people got sick in 35 states over the past year, one person died.

articles.title: Dartmouth students claim in lawsuit professors sexually abused them
articles.description: Seven women filed a lawsuit seeking $70 million from Dartmouth College on Thursday, claiming the Ivy League school turned a blind eye to its "21st Century Animal House" culture and didn't do  enough protect them from sexually predatory professors.

articles.title: FDA restricts flavored e-cigarettes, moving to ban menthol and flavored cigars
articles.description: Stores that sell fruity e-cigarettes will have to physically wall them off from teens and verify every customers is at least 18 years old. The move comes amid a 78 percent increase in e-cigarette use among high schoolers in just one year.

articles.title: Two Navy SEALs, two Marines charged in murder of Green Beret
articles.description: Navy prosecutors say Staff Sgt. Logan Melgar was asleep when four fellow special operators burst into his locked room, bound him with duct tape and put him in a choke hold that killed him. The accused face the potential of life in prison.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Saudi prosecutors: Crown Prince was unaware of Khashoggi operation
articles.description: Saudi prosecutors indicted 11 Saudi agents they say were supposed to bring journalist Jamal Khashoggi back to Saudi Arabia, not kill him. But U.S. and Turkish officials question how much Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman knew.

articles.title: Death toll continues to rise, nearly 300 missing in Northern California Camp Fire
articles.description: The death toll is now at least 59 and search teams are looking for nearly 300 people who are still missing, victims who may have died in their homes and cars.

articles.title: Early winter weather across the country causes accidents and commuter chaos
articles.description: The snow and ice caused airport delays and slippery roads, leaving bridge commuters from New York to Boston at a standstill. The White House was blanketed in snow and ice caused tree branches to snap in Cincinnati.
